title: Get the Current Branch Name
description: In this lab, you will learn how to get the current branch name in a Git repository using the `git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` command.

meta.title: Git Branch Identification | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to identify the current Git branch in your repository, a crucial skill for effective collaboration and branch management.
meta.keywords: git, branch, current branch, git commands, programming tutorials

verify.name: Verify that the appropriate branch is output
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 获取当前分支名称
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将学习如何使用 `git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` 命令获取 Git 仓库中的当前分支名称。

meta.title: Git 分支识别 | 编程教程
meta.description: 学习如何在你的仓库中识别当前的 Git 分支，这是有效协作和分支管理的一项关键技能。
meta.keywords: git, 分支, 当前分支, git 命令, 编程教程

verify.name: 验证输出的是正确的分支
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
